languages.text: "Я все еще чувствую запах крови, что пропитал это место. Сколько же мон-кай здесь погибло от рук моих озлобленных кузенов? Дюжина? Может, три?".
"I can still smell blood. This place is drenched with it. How many mon-keigh died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Three dozen?"
languages.original_text: "Я все еще чувствую запах крови, что пропитал это место. Сколько же мон-кай здесь погибло от рук моих озлобленных кузенов? Дюжина? Может, три?".

traits.locale_text: "I can still smell blood. The smell's permeated this place. How many mon-keighs died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Or three?"
"I can still smell blood. The smell's permeated this place. How many mon-keighs died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Or three?"
"I can still smell blood. The smell's permeated this place. How many mon-keighs died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Or three?"
"I can still smell blood. The smell's permeated this place. How many mon-keighs died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Or three?"
"I can still smell blood. This place is drenched with it. How many mon-keigh died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Three dozen?"
"I can still smell blood. This place is drenched with it. How many mon-keigh died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Three dozen?"

languages.text: “我依然能闻到鲜血的味道，这里到处都是这种味道。不知道我那群愤怒的表亲杀了多少猴子？是十个？还是三十个？”
languages.original_text: "I can still smell blood. This place is drenched with it. How many mon-keigh died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Three dozen?"

traits.locale_text: “我依然能闻到鲜血的味道，这里到处都是这种味道。不知道我那群愤怒的表亲杀了多少猴子？是十个？还是三十个？”

languages.text: "Ich kann noch immer Blut riechen. Alles hier wurde damit getränkt. Wie viele Chem-Pan-Sey sind hier durch die Hände meiner zornigen Vettern gestorben? Ein Dutzend? Oder drei Dutzend?"
languages.original_text: "I can still smell blood. This place is drenched with it. How many mon-keigh died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Three dozen?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann noch immer Blut riechen. Der Gestank hat sich hier dauerhaft niedergelassen. Wie viele Chem-Pan-Sey sind hier durch die Hände meiner zornigen Vettern gestorben? Ein Dutzend? Oder drei?"

languages.text: «Todavía se huele la sangre. Todo este sitio está impregnado de su olor. ¿Cuántos mon-keighs murieron aquí, víctimas de la cólera de mis parientes? ¿Una docena? ¿Tres, quizá?».
languages.original_text: "I can still smell blood. This place is drenched with it. How many mon-keigh died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Three dozen?"

traits.locale_text: «Todavía se huele la sangre. Todo este sitio está impregnado de su olor. ¿Cuántos mon-keighs murieron aquí, víctimas de la cólera de mis parientes? ¿Una docena? ¿Tres, quizá?».

languages.text: « Je sens encore l'odeur du sang, comme si les lieux en étaient imprégnés. Combien de mon-keigh sont morts ici, victimes de mes cousins enragés ? Une dizaine ? Une trentaine ? »
languages.original_text: "I can still smell blood. This place is drenched with it. How many mon-keigh died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Three dozen?"

traits.locale_text: « Je sens encore l'odeur du sang, comme si elle avait imprégné les lieux. Combien de mon-keigh sont morts ici, victimes de mes cousins enragés ? Une dizaine ? Une trentaine ? »

languages.text: 「まだ血の匂いがする。ここは血の臭いが充満している。何人のモン＝ケイがここで死んだんだ？俺の怒れる従兄弟たちの手で？12人か？それとも36人？」
languages.original_text: "I can still smell blood. This place is drenched with it. How many mon-keigh died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Three dozen?"

traits.locale_text: 「まだ血の匂いがする。ここは血の臭いが充満している。何人のモン＝ケイがここで死んだんだ？俺の怒れる従兄弟たちの手で？12人か？それとも36人？」

languages.text: "Burnuma hâlâ kan kokusu geliyor. Burası kana bulanmış. Buradaki öfkeli kuzenlerimin ellerinde kaç mon-keigh canından oldu? On mu? Otuz mu?"
languages.original_text: "I can still smell blood. This place is drenched with it. How many mon-keigh died here at the hands of my enraged cousins? A dozen? Three dozen?"

traits.locale_text: "Burnuma hâlâ kan kokusu geliyor. Burası kana bulanmış. Buradaki öfkeli kuzenlerimin ellerinde kaç mon-keigh canından oldu? Bir düzine mi? Üç düzine mi?"
